> # Short biography
## Kaize Ying, MFA 2022

>It's a great pleasure to meet you. My name is Kaize, a MFA student at LBS. Prior, I finished my undergraduate education at **the University of Oxford**, majoring in Materials Science. 

>Professional wise, I have a strong interest in corporate finance, and have completed internships both in China and the UK, including:

>
1. Triton, London, UK
2. Macquarie Infrastructure and Real Assets, London, UK
3. China Investment Corporation, Beijing, China
4. Royal Bank of Scotland, London, UK

>During my leisure time, I really enjoy cooking, playing squash, and travelling. I also used to be a stage actor for a dramashow called ***Thunderstorm***.I look forward to meeting you soon!

>Best, 

>Kaize
